channel.title: Error unpacking?
channel.description:
Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.RuntimeException: error unzipping at Class42_Sub1.method561(Class42_Sub1.java:482) at client.method57(client.java:2618) at client.method7(client.java:1981) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4377) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
whats it mean O-o how do i fixith it?
oh and i added this to class 8 [code]if(i == 10121) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12344; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12343;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 12343;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Darragaths Spear";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A very strone weapon forged by jjones10".getBytes();//examin info }[/code]

item.title: Error unpacking?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

Take it out and then see if it works again. If it doesn’t then it’s something else. I don’t see anything about class8 in the error.

item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Did you make the Model zipped in gzip?
P.s. You don’t have to gzip it. You can just put the dat there.

item.title: Error unpacking?
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

Exception in thread “Thread-4” java.lang.RuntimeException: error unzipping
at Class42_Sub1.method561(Class42_Sub1.java:482)
at client.method57(client.java:2618)
at client.method7(client.java:1981)
at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115)
at client.run(client.java:4377)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

whats it mean O-o how do i fixith it?

oh and i added this to class 8

if(i == 10121) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 12344; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2000; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 572; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 25; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 12343;//male wearing // class8.anInt200 = 12343;//female wearing // class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves // class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Darragaths Spear";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A very strone weapon forged by jjones10".getBytes();//examin info }
